mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usertable (id, pw, nick, user_name, ph, postcode, roadAddr, detailAddr, extraAddr) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{nick}, #{user_name}, #{ph}, #{postcode}, #{roadAddr}, #{detailAddr}, #{extraAddr});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM usertable WHERE id = #{id} or nick = #{nick};
SELECT * FROM usertable WHERE id = #{id} AND ph = #{ph}
